title: Deep elf annihilator
data:

*For a list of all deep elves, see [list of deep elves](/List_of_deep_elves "List of deep elves").*

| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                                                                          | 1                                                                                                                                                                              |

| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                                                           | None                                                                                                                                                                           |

| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                                                            | [Natural](/Category:Natural_holiness "Category:Natural holiness")                                                                                                              |

|   |                                                                                                                                                              |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A deep elf who exults in conjured mayhem and destruction. It is widely hated and feared, both for the power and for the precision of its destructive magics. |

## Useful info

**Deep elf annihilators** are conjurers able to cast the deadly [Lehudib's Crystal Spear](/Lehudib%27s_Crystal_Spear "Lehudib's Crystal Spear"). They can be found often in the last floor of the [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls"), but can also appear in [the Vaults](/The_Vaults "The Vaults") and [the Depths](/The_Depths "The Depths").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                                        |                                                     |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Lightning Bolt](/Lightning_Bolt "Lightning Bolt") (3d20)                              | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Lehudib's Crystal Spear](/Lehudib%27s_Crystal_Spear "Lehudib's Crystal Spear") (3d34) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Blink](/Blink "Blink")                                                                | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Iron Shot](/Iron_Shot "Iron Shot") (3d28)                                             | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot5       | [Poison Arrow](/Poison_Arrow "Poison Arrow") (3d22)                                    | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips and tricks

Like most natural spellcasters, annihilators are pathetic when [silenced](/Silence "Silence") or [waterlogged](/Phial_of_floods "Phial of floods").
html:
Deep elf annihilator

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.26: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all deep elves, see list of deep elves.

deep elf annihilator e 
HP 44-90
HD 15
XP 1260
Speed 10
AC 1
EV 12
Will 120
Attack1 12 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type elf, elf
Flags See invisible
Speaks
Warm-blooded
A deep elf who exults in conjured mayhem and destruction. It is widely hated and feared, both for the power and for the precision of its destructive magics.

Useful info

Deep elf annihilators are conjurers able to cast the deadly Lehudib's Crystal Spear. They can be found often in the last floor of the Elven Halls, but can also appear in the Vaults and the Depths.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Lightning Bolt (3d20) Wizard flag
Slot2 Lehudib's Crystal Spear (3d34) Wizard flag
Slot3 Blink Wizard flag
Slot4 Iron Shot (3d28) Wizard flag
Slot5 Poison Arrow (3d22) Wizard flag

Tips and tricks

Like most natural spellcasters, annihilators are pathetic when silenced or waterlogged.
